page.title: 08TAWSTOCK CHURCH IMPRESSIONS
page.content:
{MY FIRST IMPRESSIONS {OF TAWSTOCK CHURCH
My first impressions of Tawstock church is that when I walked in and looked at the inside of the church ,it reminded me of a small Cathedral. It is for that reason it is known as the little Cathedral of North Devon. The church is dark but spacious.I like the way the church is set out, because the South Transept is devoted to the Bouchier Wrey family. In St. Peter's Church Tawstock, there is so much worth preserving.The responsibility for passing on our heritage to the next generation rests on the Church and its parishioners.
